q: `` Angola is the weakest partner in AU unity,'' said a diplomat who is following the Ivory Coast crisis, adding that South Africa has also not weighed in as strongly as some had hoped. The message, however, is that Gbagbo is an unreasonable operator and we need to keep AU unity and possibly consider sanctions, the diplomat said.
